SEARCH
Package com.pds.curiousmind.model.question.option

Class ImageOption

java.lang.Object
com.pds.curiousmind.model.question.option.Option
com.pds.curiousmind.model.question.option.ImageOption
@Entity public class ImageOption extends Option
Represents an option for a question that includes an associated image, such as for image-based multiple-choice questions.

This class extends Option by adding an image URL, allowing the option to display an image alongside its label. It is mapped as an entity in the database and can be used in any question type that supports image-based options.

Usage Example:

     ImageOption option = new ImageOption("Apple", "https://example.com/apple.png");
     String label = option.getLabel();
     String imageUrl = option.getImageURL();
Since:
1.0
